author: Alan Weedon
title: 'You may as well have toilet paper over your face': Why China's COVID-19 supplies are being recalled
description: As Spain and the Netherlands have learned, not all medical products are created equal. In a time where everyone's racing to fill supply gaps, how do you know if medical supplies do what they're supposed to?
content:
Posted April 04, 2020 05:59:27 China's had a rough few months. Key points:
  • China has been rapidly scaling up its medical equipment manufacturing base
  • Most medical product regulation varies by country, at varying enforcement levels
